price: به سوی فرعون و اشراف [قوم] او؛ و[لی] آنان گردنکشی کردند و گروهی برتری‌خواه بودند.
arabic: إِلَىٰ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَمَلَإِيْهِۦ فَٱسۡتَكۡبَرُواْ وَكَانُواْ قَوۡمًا عَالِينَ

version.title: Persian Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Persian by the team of the Persian language in Rowwad Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: ilā fir'ʿawna wamala-ihi fa-is'takbarū wakānū qawman ʿālīna
